about_page.title: We Are Omuz Company
about_page.subtitle: Innovating Technology for the Future
about_page.story_desc: Founded with a vision to revolutionize the tech landscape in Tajikistan, Omuz has grown from a visionary startup to a leading software and educational ecosystem.
about_page.mission_desc: To empower businesses and individuals through innovative technology and accessible education, fostering a digital ecosystem that drives growth and opportunity in Tajikistan and beyond.
about_page.vision_desc: To be the leading catalyst for digital transformation in Central Asia, recognized for excellence, innovation, and social impact.
about_page.cta_subtitle: Be a part of the digital revolution. Whether as a partner, student, or team member.

contact_page.title: Get in Touch
contact_page.subtitle: Let's discuss how we can help your business grow

products_crm.title: CRM
products_crm.subtitle: Academy Management System
products_crm.features_title: Everything You Need to Run Your Center
products_crm.features_subtitle: Powerful tools designed specifically for educational institutions.

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.desc: Real-time insights into enrollment, attendance, and student performance.

scheduling.title: Smart Scheduling
scheduling.desc: Automated class scheduling and room allocation management.

payments.title: Performance Tracking
payments.desc: Track student grades, generate progress reports, and manage lesson plans.

students.title: Student Portal
students.desc: Dedicated access for students to check grades and attendance.

mobile.title: Mobile App
mobile.desc: Manage your business on the go with our iOS and Android apps.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.desc: Dedicated technical support team ready to assist you anytime.

faq.a1: Yes, Omuz CRM is fully cloud-based, allowing you to access it from anywhere securely.
faq.q2: Can I migrate my existing data?
faq.a2: Absolutely. We offer free data migration services to help you switch smoothly.
faq.a3: We provide comprehensive onboarding and training for your entire team.

products_crm.integrations_subtitle: Connect Omuz CRM with your favorite tools to automate your workflow.

workflow.step1_desc: Easily upload an Excel file containing your current students, staff, and schedules.
workflow.step2_desc: Set up your physical locations, rooms, and specific billing rules in a few clicks.
workflow.step3_desc: Send automated email or SMS invites to your team and students to download the app.

0.q: How does the CRM help my academy?
0.a: Our CRM automates student tracking, scheduling, and grading, allowing teachers to focus on education rather than administration.

1.a: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and secure video hosting for all lessons and materials.

2.q: Can I use Omuz.tj on mobile?
2.a: Absolutely! Our system is fully responsive and works beautifully on any device.

3.q: Do you offer support in Tajik?
3.a: Yes, our support team is available 24/7 and speaks Tajik, Russian, and English.

4.a: Setup usually takes less than 24 hours. You can start importing your data immediately.

5.a: We offer a comprehensive demo so you can experience all the features.
